info.name: Twitter Gray Theme
info.description:
A custom gray theme for Twitter & Tweetdeck originally designed for Pikaclicks.
The theme is perfect if light theme is too light and dark is to dark.
info.additionalInfo: Disclaimer This theme might still have some things not looking 100% but feel free to report if you find anything. IMPORTANT Make sure you turn on the default light theme on Twitter when trying to use this theme along it. If you are on dark the colors might not blend correct or still have dark sections. You can still change the blue color to any other you still prefer though. Just background should be light theme.
